title: Your Kingdom - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Cute Protagonist   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Hiding True Identity   Master-Servant Relationship   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Past Trauma   Royalty   Sickly Characters   Timid Protagonist   Tragic Past   Weak Protagonist
author: Takana Ayame   高菜あやめ
description: One day, the sickly prince of the Maillard Kingdom woke up in an unfamiliar, gorgeous room. He was told that this was the royal palace of the famous country Barthelemy, a place known for its advanced medical treatment, by Fernand, an angelic beauty serving as his new attendant. The food, clothes, and scenery outside all confused the prince. After all, the life the prince lived in his own country was…>
